parental.title: Parental Controls
parental.subtitle: Protecting children from accessing age-restricted content

intro.title: About Parental Controls
intro.text1: ReelPorn is committed to preventing minors from accessing adult content. We strongly encourage parents and guardians to take an active role in monitoring and controlling their children's internet usage.
intro.text2: This page provides information about various methods and tools you can use to prevent access to adult websites, including ReelPorn.com, on devices used by children.

methods.title: How to Block Adult Content
methods.intro: There are several effective ways to restrict access to adult websites:

router.title: Router-Level Blocking
router.text: Most modern routers include parental control features that allow you to block specific websites or categories of content across all devices connected to your home network. Check your router's documentation or contact your router manufacturer for setup instructions.

isp.title: Internet Service Provider (ISP) Controls
isp.text: Many internet service providers offer parental control services that can filter content before it reaches your home. Contact your ISP to learn about available parental control options and how to enable them.

device.title: Device-Level Controls
device.text: Both computers and mobile devices have built-in parental control features. On Windows, use Family Safety. On Mac, use Screen Time and Parental Controls. On iOS and Android devices, use the built-in Screen Time and Family Link features respectively.

software.title: Third-Party Filtering Software
software.intro: Several reputable companies offer comprehensive parental control and content filtering solutions:
software.netnanny: Comprehensive internet filtering and parental control software for Windows, Mac, Android, and iOS devices.
software.norton: Free parental control service from Norton that helps protect children from inappropriate content.
software.qustodio: Cross-platform parental control software with web filtering, time limits, and activity monitoring.
software.opendns: Free DNS-based filtering service that blocks adult content at the network level.

resources.title: Additional Resources
resources.text: For more information about internet safety and protecting children online, visit these resources:

notice.title: Important Notice
notice.text: While we make every effort to prevent minors from accessing our site through age verification, the ultimate responsibility for preventing children from accessing adult content lies with parents and guardians. We strongly recommend implementing multiple layers of protection using the methods described above.

cookies.title: We use cookies
cookies.description: We use cookies and similar technologies to enhance your browsing experience, personalize content and ads, provide social media features, and analyze our traffic. You can choose which cookies to accept.

preferences.title: Cookie preferences
preferences.description: We use different types of cookies to optimize your experience on our website. Click on the categories below to learn more and customize your preferences. Please note that blocking some types of cookies may impact your experience.

essential.title: Essential cookies
essential.description: These cookies are necessary for the website to function and cannot be disabled. They are usually only set in response to actions made by you such as setting your privacy preferences, logging in or filling in forms.

functional.title: Functional cookies
functional.description: These cookies enable enhanced functionality and personalization, such as videos and live chats. They may be set by us or by third party providers whose services we have added to our pages.

analytics.title: Analytics cookies
analytics.description: These cookies allow us to count visits and traffic sources so we can measure and improve the performance of our site. They help us understand which pages are most and least popular and see how visitors move around the site.

advertising.title: Targeting/Advertising cookies
advertising.description: These cookies may be set through our site by our advertising partners. They may be used by those companies to build a profile of your interests and show you relevant ads on other sites.

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content1: By accessing or using ReelPorn.ai ("the Service"), you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service and all applicable laws and regulations. If you do not agree with any of these terms, you are prohibited from using or accessing this site.
acceptance.content2: You must be at least 18 years of age (or the age of majority in your jurisdiction) to use this Service. By using the Service, you represent and warrant that you meet this age requirement.

account.title: Account Registration
account.intro: To access certain features of the Service, you must register for an account. You agree to:
account.item1: Provide accurate, current, and complete information during registration
account.item2: Maintain and promptly update your account information
account.item3: Maintain the security and confidentiality of your password
account.item4: Accept responsibility for all activities that occur under your account
account.item5: Notify us immediately of any unauthorized use of your account
account.outro: We reserve the right to suspend or terminate accounts that violate these terms or engage in fraudulent or illegal activities.

subscription.title: Subscription and Payment
subscription.intro: Some aspects of the Service require a paid subscription. By purchasing a subscription, you agree to pay all fees associated with your chosen plan.
subscription.item1: Subscriptions automatically renew unless cancelled before the renewal date
subscription.item2: Prices may change with 30 days notice
subscription.item3: Refunds are provided only as required by law or at our sole discretion
subscription.item4: You are responsible for all taxes associated with your subscription
subscription.item5: Payment information must be accurate and current

userContent.title: User Content
userContent.intro: Users may submit content to the Service. By submitting content, you:
userContent.item1: Grant us a worldwide, non-exclusive, royalty-free license to use, display, and distribute your content
userContent.item2: Warrant that you own or have rights to all content you submit

userContent.item4: Accept responsibility for maintaining 2257 records where applicable
userContent.item5: Agree not to submit content that is illegal, harmful, or violates others' rights

prohibited.title: Prohibited Conduct
prohibited.item1: Use the Service for any illegal purpose or in violation of any laws
prohibited.item2: Upload content involving minors or non-consenting individuals
prohibited.item3: Harass, abuse, or harm other users
prohibited.item5: Interfere with or disrupt the Service or servers
prohibited.item6: Attempt to gain unauthorized access to any portion of the Service
prohibited.item7: Use automated systems or software to extract data from the Service
prohibited.item8: Transmit viruses, malware, or other harmful code
prohibited.item9: Violate the intellectual property rights of others
prohibited.item10: Engage in any conduct that restricts or inhibits others' use of the Service

intellectualProperty.title: Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.content1: The Service and its original content (excluding user content) are and will remain the exclusive property of ReelPorn and its licensors. The Service is protected by copyright, trademark, and other intellectual property laws.
intellectualProperty.content2: Our trademarks and trade dress may not be used in connection with any product or service without our prior written consent.

privacy.title: Privacy
privacy.content: Your use of the Service is also governed by our Privacy Policy. Please review our Privacy Policy, which also governs the Site and informs users of our data collection practices.

dmca.title: DMCA Compliance
dmca.content: We respect intellectual property rights and will respond to valid DMCA takedown notices. If you believe your content has been used without authorization, please contact our DMCA agent at dmca@reelporn.ai.

disclaimers.title: Disclaimers
disclaimers.content1: THE SERVICE IS PROVIDED "AS IS" WITHOUT WARRANTIES OF ANY KIND, EITHER EXPRESS OR IMPLIED. WE DISCLAIM ALL WARRANTIES INCLUDING MERCHANTABILITY, FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE, AND NON-INFRINGEMENT.
disclaimers.content2: We do not warrant that the Service will be uninterrupted, secure, or error-free. We do not warrant the accuracy or completeness of any content.

liability.title: Limitation of Liability
liability.content1: TO THE MAXIMUM EXTENT PERMITTED BY LAW, REELPORN SHALL NOT BE LIABLE FOR ANY INDIRECT, INCIDENTAL, SPECIAL, CONSEQUENTIAL, OR PUNITIVE DAMAGES, OR ANY LOSS OF PROFITS OR REVENUES, WHETHER INCURRED DIRECTLY OR INDIRECTLY, OR ANY LOSS OF DATA, USE, GOODWILL, OR OTHER INTANGIBLE LOSSES.
liability.content2: Our total liability shall not exceed the amount you paid us in the twelve months preceding the claim.

indemnification.title: Indemnification
indemnification.content: You agree to indemnify and hold harmless ReelPorn and its officers, directors, employees, and agents from any claims, damages, losses, liabilities, and expenses (including legal fees) arising from your use of the Service or violation of these Terms.

termination.title: Termination
termination.content1: We may terminate or suspend your account and access to the Service immediately, without prior notice or liability, for any reason, including breach of these Terms.
termination.content2: Upon termination, your right to use the Service will immediately cease. All provisions of these Terms which by their nature should survive termination shall survive.

governingLaw.title: Governing Law
governingLaw.content: These Terms shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the jurisdiction in which ReelPorn operates, without regard to its conflict of law provisions. You agree to submit to the personal jurisdiction of the courts located within that jurisdiction.

changes.title: Changes to Terms
changes.content1: We reserve the right to modify these Terms at any time. We will notify users of any material changes by posting the new Terms on this page and updating the "Last Updated" date.
changes.content2: Your continued use of the Service after any changes constitutes acceptance of the new Terms.

contact.title: Contact Information
contact.intro: For questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us at:

infoCollect.provide3: Payment information (processed securely through third-party providers)
infoCollect.auto3: Usage data (pages visited, videos watched, interactions)

infoUse.title: How We Use Your Information
infoUse.item2: Process transactions and send related information
infoUse.item4: Respond to your comments and questions
infoUse.item5: Personalize your experience and provide recommendations
infoUse.item6: Monitor and analyze usage and trends
infoUse.item7: Detect and prevent fraud and abuse

infoSharing.title: Information Sharing
infoSharing.intro: We do not sell your personal information. We may share information in these circumstances:
infoSharing.item1: Service Providers: With trusted third parties who assist in operating our Service
infoSharing.item2: Legal Requirements: When required by law or to protect rights and safety
infoSharing.item3: Business Transfers: In connection with a merger, sale, or acquisition
infoSharing.item4: With Consent: When you explicitly agree to sharing
infoSharing.item5: Aggregated Data: Non-identifiable statistical data for analysis

dataSecurity.title: Data Security
dataSecurity.intro: We implement appropriate technical and organizational security measures to protect your personal information, including:
dataSecurity.item5: Secure payment processing through PCI-compliant providers
dataSecurity.outro: However, no method of transmission or storage is 100% secure. We cannot guarantee absolute security.

privacyRights.title: Your Privacy Rights
privacyRights.intro: Depending on your location, you may have certain rights regarding your personal information:
privacyRights.item1: Access: Request a copy of your personal information
privacyRights.item2: Correction: Request correction of inaccurate information
privacyRights.item3: Deletion: Request deletion of your account and associated data
privacyRights.item4: Portability: Receive your data in a portable format
privacyRights.item5: Objection: Object to certain processing of your information
privacyRights.item6: Restriction: Request limited processing of your information
privacyRights.outro: To exercise these rights, contact us at support@reelporn.ai

cookies.title: Cookies and Tracking
cookies.content1: We use cookies and similar technologies to enhance your experience. For detailed information, please see our Cookie Policy.
cookies.content2: You can control cookies through your browser settings and our cookie preference center.

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Services
thirdParty.intro1: Our Service may contain links to third-party websites and services. We are not responsible for their privacy practices. We encourage you to review their privacy policies.

childrenPrivacy.title: Children's Privacy
childrenPrivacy.content: Our Service is strictly for adults 18 years and older. We do not knowingly collect information from anyone under 18. If we discover we have collected information from a minor, we will delete it immediately.

dataRetention.title: Data Retention
dataRetention.intro: We retain your personal information for as long as necessary to:
dataRetention.outro: When you delete your account, we will delete or anonymize your personal information, except where retention is required by law.

internationalTransfers.title: International Data Transfers
internationalTransfers.content: Your information may be transferred to and processed in countries other than your own. These countries may have different data protection laws. We ensure appropriate safeguards are in place for such transfers.

californiaRights.title: California Privacy Rights
californiaRights.intro: California residents have additional rights under the California Consumer Privacy Act (CCPA):
californiaRights.item1: Right to know what personal information is collected
californiaRights.item2: Right to know if personal information is sold or disclosed
californiaRights.item3: Right to opt-out of the sale of personal information
californiaRights.item4: Right to non-discrimination for exercising privacy rights

europeanRights.title: European Privacy Rights
europeanRights.content: If you are in the European Economic Area (EEA), you have additional rights under the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR), including the right to lodge a complaint with your local data protection authority.

policyUpdates.title: Updates to This Policy
policyUpdates.content1: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page and updating the "Last Updated" date.
policyUpdates.content2: For significant changes, we will provide additional notice (such as email notification or a prominent notice on our Service).

contact.title: Contact Information
contact.intro: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy or our privacy practices, please contact us:

notification.title: Copyright Infringement Notification
notification.content: ReelPorn respects the intellectual property rights of others and expects its users to do the same. In accordance with the Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA"), we will respond expeditiously to claims of copyright infringement committed using the ReelPorn website.

filing.title: Filing a DMCA Notice
filing.intro: If you believe that your copyrighted work has been copied in a way that constitutes copyright infringement and is accessible on this site, you may notify our copyright agent, as set forth in the DMCA. For your complaint to be valid under the DMCA, you must provide the following information in writing:
filing.item1: An electronic or physical signature of a person authorized to act on behalf of the copyright owner
filing.item2: Identification of the copyrighted work that you claim has been infringed
filing.item3: Identification of the material that is claimed to be infringing and where it is located on the site
filing.item4: Information reasonably sufficient to permit us to contact you, such as your address, telephone number, and email address
filing.item5: A statement that you have a good faith belief that use of the material in the manner complained of is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or law
filing.item6: A statement, made under penalty of perjury, that the above information is accurate, and that you are the copyright owner or are authorized to act on behalf of the owner

agent.title: Designated Copyright Agent
agent.intro: Please send all DMCA notices to our designated agent:
agent.name: DMCA Agent

counter.title: Counter-Notification
counter.intro: If you believe that your content was removed or access to it was disabled by mistake or misidentification, you may file a counter-notification with us. To be effective, a counter-notification must be a written communication that includes the following:
counter.item2: Identification of the material that has been removed or to which access has been disabled and the location at which the material appeared before it was removed or access disabled
counter.item3: A statement under penalty of perjury that you have a good faith belief that the material was removed or disabled as a result of mistake or misidentification
counter.item4: Your name, address, telephone number, and email address
counter.item5: A statement that you consent to the jurisdiction of the Federal District Court for the judicial district in which your address is located

repeat.title: Repeat Infringers
repeat.content: In accordance with the DMCA and other applicable law, we have adopted a policy of terminating, in appropriate circumstances, users who are deemed to be repeat infringers. We may also at our sole discretion limit access to the site and/or terminate the accounts of any users who infringe any intellectual property rights of others.

notice.title: Important Notice
notice.content: Please note: Under Section 512(f) of the DMCA, any person who knowingly materially misrepresents that material or activity is infringing may be subject to liability for damages, including costs and attorneys' fees. Please consult your legal advisor before filing a notice or counter-notice.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about ReelPorn

q1.question: What is ReelPorn?
q1.answer: ReelPorn is a premium adult content platform specializing in short-form video content (15-second reels). We provide a TikTok-like experience for adult entertainment with swipe functionality, personalized feeds, and high-quality AI-generated content.

q2.question: Is ReelPorn free to use?
q2.answer: ReelPorn offers both free and premium content. You can browse and watch limited content for free, but a premium subscription unlocks unlimited access to all videos, HD/4K quality, download features, and ad-free viewing.

q3.question: How do I verify my age?
q3.answer: Age verification is required to access ReelPorn. When you first visit, you must confirm you are 18 years or older. This is a legal requirement to ensure minors cannot access adult content.

q4.question: Is my data safe and private?
q4.answer: Yes, we take privacy seriously. All data is encrypted, we never share personal information with third parties without consent, and you can browse anonymously. Please review our Privacy Policy for detailed information.

q1.question: How do I create an account?
q1.answer: Click the "Sign Up" button, choose your membership plan, enter your email and create a password. Verify your email address and you're ready to start watching!

q2.question: What payment methods do you accept?
q2.answer: We accept major credit cards (Visa, MasterCard, American Express), PayPal, and cryptocurrency payments (Bitcoin, Ethereum). All transactions are processed securely and discreetly.

q3.question: How do I cancel my subscription?
q3.answer: You can cancel your subscription anytime from your account settings. Go to Profile > Subscription > Cancel Subscription. You'll continue to have access until the end of your billing period.

q4.question: Will charges appear as "ReelPorn" on my statement?
q4.answer: No, for your privacy, charges appear under a discreet billing name like "RP Media Services" or "Digital Entertainment Services" on your bank statement.

q5.question: Can I upgrade or downgrade my plan?
q5.answer: Yes, you can change your subscription plan at any time. The new plan will take effect at your next billing cycle. Any price difference will be prorated.

q1.question: What kind of content is available?
q1.answer: We offer a wide variety of adult content in 15-second reel format, including amateur, professional, various categories and fetishes. All content is from verified adults and complies with legal requirements.

q2.question: Can I download videos for offline viewing?
q2.answer: Premium members can download videos for offline viewing. Downloads are encrypted and can only be viewed through our app while your subscription is active.

q3.question: How does the recommendation algorithm work?
q3.answer: Our AI-powered algorithm learns from your viewing habits, likes, and preferences to show you personalized content. The more you interact, the better the recommendations become.

q4.question: Can I upload my own content?
q4.answer: Yes, verified creators can upload content. You must complete our creator verification process, provide 2257 documentation, and comply with our content guidelines.

q5.question: How do I report inappropriate content?
q5.answer: Every video has a report button. Click it to report content that violates our terms, is non-consensual, involves minors, or is otherwise inappropriate. We review all reports within 24 hours.

q1.question: How do I become a verified creator?
q1.answer: Apply through the Creator Portal, provide government-issued ID, complete 2257 documentation, and pass our verification process. Approval typically takes 24-48 hours.

q2.question: How much can I earn as a creator?
q2.answer: Creators earn through multiple revenue streams: ad revenue share (60%), tips from fans, pay-per-view content, and subscription tiers. Top creators earn thousands per month.

q3.question: What are the content requirements?
q3.answer: Videos must be 15 seconds or less, minimum 720p quality, all participants must be 18+, and content must be consensual. We prohibit illegal content, violence, and non-consensual material.

q4.question: How do I get paid?
q4.answer: Payments are processed weekly via direct deposit, PayPal, or cryptocurrency. Minimum payout is $50. You'll receive detailed earnings reports in your creator dashboard.

q5.question: Do I retain rights to my content?
q5.answer: Yes, you retain ownership of your content. You grant us a license to display it on our platform. You can remove your content at any time from your creator dashboard.

q1.question: What devices are supported?
q1.answer: ReelPorn works on all modern browsers (Chrome, Firefox, Safari, Edge) on desktop and mobile. We also have native apps for iOS and Android (available outside app stores).

q2.question: Why is video playback stuttering?
q2.answer: This is usually due to slow internet connection. Try reducing video quality in settings, closing other tabs/apps, or switching to a faster network. Premium members get priority streaming.

q3.question: How do I clear my viewing history?
q3.answer: Go to Profile > Privacy Settings > Clear History. You can clear all history or selectively remove items. You can also enable incognito mode for private browsing.

q4.question: Can I use a VPN?
q4.answer: Yes, VPN usage is allowed and recommended for privacy. However, some features may be limited based on the VPN location due to regional content restrictions.

q1.question: How do you verify performers are 18+?
q1.answer: We comply with 18 U.S.C. 2257 requirements. All creators must provide government-issued ID and we maintain detailed records. We use AI and manual review to verify ages.

q2.question: What if my content was uploaded without permission?
q2.answer: Submit a DMCA takedown request to dmca@reelporn.ai with proof of ownership. We remove infringing content within 24 hours of receiving valid notices.

q3.question: Is ReelPorn legal in my country?
q3.answer: Adult content laws vary by country. It's your responsibility to ensure you're complying with local laws. We block access from countries where adult content is prohibited.

q4.question: How do you prevent minors from accessing?
q4.answer: We use age verification gates, require account creation with age confirmation, provide parental control information, and cooperate with filtering services.

help.title: Still need help?
help.description: Can't find the answer you're looking for? Our support team is here to help!

cookiePolicy.title: Cookie Policy
cookiePolicy.subtitle: How we use cookies and similar technologies

whatAre.title: What Are Cookies?
whatAre.content1: Cookies are small text files that are placed on your device when you visit our website. They help us provide you with a better experience by remembering your preferences, analyzing site traffic, and personalizing content.
whatAre.content2: We also use similar technologies like pixels, local storage, and device fingerprinting to enhance your browsing experience and improve our services.

howWeUse.title: How We Use Cookies
howWeUse.intro: We use cookies and similar technologies for the following purposes:

essential.title: Essential Operations
essential.description: To provide core functionality like user authentication, security, and site integrity

preferences.title: Preferences & Settings
preferences.description: To remember your choices such as language preferences, playback quality, and display settings

analytics.title: Analytics & Performance
analytics.description: To understand how users interact with our site and improve our services

marketing.title: Marketing & Advertising
marketing.description: To deliver relevant advertisements and measure their effectiveness

essential.title: Essential Cookies
essential.description: These cookies are necessary for the website to function properly. They enable basic functions like page navigation, secure areas access, and age verification.

functional.title: Functional Cookies
functional.description: These cookies enable enhanced functionality and personalization. They may be set by us or by third-party providers whose services we use.

analyticsType.title: Analytics Cookies
analyticsType.description: These cookies help us understand how visitors interact with our website by collecting and reporting information anonymously.

advertising.title: Advertising Cookies
advertising.description: These cookies are used to deliver advertisements that are relevant to you and your interests. They also help limit the number of times you see an advertisement.

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Cookies
thirdParty.intro1: Some cookies are placed by third-party services that appear on our pages. We do not control these cookies and encourage you to check the third-party websites for more information about how they use cookies.
items: Social media platforms - for content sharing

managing.title: Managing Your Cookie Preferences
managing.intro: You have control over which cookies we use. You can manage your preferences at any time:
managing.buttonDescription: Click the button above to review and update your cookie preferences.
managing.browserIntro: You can also control cookies through your browser settings:

browsers.chrome: Chrome: Settings â†’ Privacy and security â†’ Cookies and other site data
browsers.firefox: Firefox: Settings â†’ Privacy & Security â†’ Cookies and Site Data
browsers.safari: Safari: Preferences â†’ Privacy â†’ Manage Website Data
browsers.edge: Edge: Settings â†’ Privacy, search, and services â†’ Cookies and site permissions

duration.title: Cookie Duration
duration.intro: Cookies can be either session or persistent cookies:

session.title: Session Cookies
session.description: These are temporary cookies that expire when you close your browser. We use these for security and essential site functions.

persistent.title: Persistent Cookies
persistent.description: These cookies remain on your device for a set period or until you delete them. We use these to remember your preferences and provide personalized features.

updates.title: Updates to This Policy
updates.content: We may update this Cookie Policy from time to time to reflect changes in our practices or for other operational, legal, or regulatory reasons. We will notify you of any significant changes by posting the new policy on this page with an updated revision date.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.intro: If you have any questions about our use of cookies or this policy, please contact us:
